responses: my work here is quite simple and structered. I offer services like:

Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses that cause illness ranging from the common cold to more severe diseases. A novel coronavirus is a new strain that has not been previously identified in humans.

patterns: what are the symptoms of corona
what are the symptoms of covid19
what are the symptoms of covid
responses: MOST COMMON SYMPTOMS:fever, dry cough, tiredness. LESS COMMON SYMPTOMS: aches and pains, sore throat, diarrhoea, conjunctivitis, headache, loss of taste or smell, a rash on skin, or discolouration of fingers or toes. Serious symptoms: difficulty breathing or shortness of breath, chest pain or pressure, loss of speech or movement
what type of headache? Like Migrane, Tension headache, Hypertension headache, Sinus headaches

patterns: i am having a migrane headache
what are the causes of migranes
what are the causes of migrane headaches
what are the prevention of migranes
what are the prevetion of migrane headache
responses: CAUSES: Doctors don’t know the exact cause of migraine headaches, although they seem to be related to changes in your brain and to your genes. PREVENTION:Manage Stress, Excercise/ do yoga regularly, eat on a regular schedule, drink more water.

patterns: what medicine is recommended for migranes
what medicine can i have for migrane
responses: Medicines for migrane: Aspirin, Naproxen, First try out yoga and then go for medicine

patterns: causes and prevention of tension headache
general steps to prevent tension headaches
how to get rid of tension headaches
responses: PREVENTION: The only way is to relax, Excercise regularly or yoga, Eating Healthy
The best way is to practice yoga stretch your neck. Drink water and relax. Use a hot water bag on your neck. If that dont work can consume : Naproxen.

patterns: What are the causes of hypertension headache
what are the main causes for hypertension
responses: CAUSES: High blood pressure. PREVENTION: If you think you’re experiencing a hypertension headache, you should seek immediate medical attention.

patterns: What medicine is to be taken for general headaches
responses: Asprin or Naproxen

when to see a doctor for headache
responses: stiff neck, rash, the worst headache you’ve ever had vomiting, confusion, slurred speech, any fever of 100.4°F or higher, paralysis in any part of your body or visual loss

Signs and symptoms of sinus headaches may include: Pain, pressure and fullness in your cheeks, brow or forehead, Worsening pain if you bend forward or lie down, Stuffy nose, Fatigue, Achy feeling in your upper teeth

patterns: what are causes and prevention for sinus/sinusitis
responses: CAUSES: Nasal polyps. Deviated nasal septum. Respiratory tract infections. Allergies such as hay fever. PREVENTION: Avoid upper respiratory infections like cold. Avoid cigarette smoke and polluted air. Use a humidifier.

patterns: causes and prevention of sinus headaches
what are causes and prevention for sinus headache
responses: CAUSES: Sinus headaches are usually associated with migraines or other forms of headaches. And not caused due to sinus infections. PREVENTION: Avoid cold weather, Avoid cold drinks

patterns: what is the medicine for sinus
what is the medicine for sinusitis
responses: Consult doctor and check the stage of sinus
